sourcesContent:
<template>
  {{ $route.params.no }}  
</template>
<script>
import axios from 'axios';
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      no:0,
      detail:{},
      mm:[],
      datas:[]
    }
  },
  created(){
    this.no=this.$route.params.no
  },
  mounted(){
    axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/web/recipe/detail_vue/',{
      params:{
        no:this.no
      }
    }).then(res=>{
      this.detail=res.data.detail
      this.mm=res.data.mm
      this.datas=res.data.data  
    }).catch(err=>{
      console.log(err.response)
    })
  }
}
</script>
